author: jvanzyl
msg: o the archetype sources are now all components and I left some notes about what needs to be done next
- separate the configuration of archeytpe from the catalog of available archetypes
You might store a configuration of where to look for catalogs, say on an URL so that you can create new archetypes, up-date
a remote catalog (wiki, or an xml file somewhere) and have developers automatically discover them.
